meta.description: Determine the optimal number of medium and small factories to build to meet toy production requirements with limited operators.

sets.name: FACTORY_TYPES
sets.description: Types of factories that can be built.

params.name: production_capacity
params.description: Number of toys produced per day by each factory type.

params.name: operator_requirement
params.description: Number of operators required for each factory type.

vars.name: num_factories
vars.description: Number of factories to build of each type.

objective.name: min_total_factories
objective.description: Minimize the total number of factories built.

constraints.name: production_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 250 toys are produced per day.

constraints.name: operator_limit
constraints.description: Limit the number of operators to 16.
